participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

su_vape_motiv_01.Description: It is less harmful to my health than smoking | 1=Not at all true ; 2=A little true ; 3=Somewhat true ; 4=Pretty true ; 5=Very true [xskipout_vape] = '1' and ([event-name] = '2_year_follow_up_y_arm_1' or [event-name] = '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1')
